projects.title: Dot Search
projects.description: An alternate search experience. Type your query then hover on the dots to reveal your results and discover pages you would normally overlook.

projects.title: Venngenn
projects.description: Venn diagrams meet AI image generation. Mix styles and environments, and see your image change where they intersect.

projects.title: Mold Studios
projects.description: Creating candles by manufacturaing reusable 3D-printed molds. Each candle was hand-poured and cast from a CAD model.
projects.detailText:
*People:* Adrianna Varela,
John Peterson,
Kade Eckert  *Time:* 12 Weeks *Year:* 2020

projects.title: Perfect Coffee Water
projects.description: A scalable brand identity and packaging system for Perfect Coffee Water, a specialty coffee brand focused on better water for better coffee. Their mineral blend enhances every brew, bringing out greater flavor and balance in each cup.
projects.detailText:
*People:* Garrett King,
Courtland King *Year:* 2022 *Role:*Freelance Design,
Packaging Design,
Brand Identity

projects.title: Spatial Explorations
projects.description: A collection of speculative prototypes exploring interfaces for augmented reality. Each concept explores spatial experiences from a handheld map that wraps around your wrist, to a 3D-print preview showing scale in context, to an augmented scroll that slows social media use, and a playful blend of real-world pool and video game physics.

projects.title: Public Read Receipts
projects.description: A live chat that obfuscates every user’s message through an AI-generated layer to match a daily “POV.” The project explores how meaning and intent shift when conversations are filtered through automated reinterpretation and how people begin to adapt or play into the role.
